User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10.6; rv:8.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/8.0
Build ID: 20111104165243

Steps to reproduce:

Drag and drop a picture from Firefox into a desktop folder window. (A folder inside of another folder)


Actual results:

The folder that the picture was dragged into moves from its original location. 




Expected results:

The folder should have stayed where it was instead of moving. This does not happen with Safari, so this isn't a general Mac problem. It has also been happening for maybe a couple years now. 

Basically, whenever a picture is dragged into a folder window- the folder that the picture was dragged into moves to some ridiculous location. I think that the folder might be being moved to where the picture ends up inside of that folder.
